SEARCH
Package com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.controller

Class TherapistController

java.lang.Object
com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.controller.TherapistController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/api/therapist") public class TherapistController extends Object
TherapistController handles endpoints related to therapists' schedules, availability, and reviews.

  • Method Details

    • showAvailabilityPage

      @GetMapping("/availability") public String showAvailabilityPage()
      Displays the therapist's availability page.
      Returns:
      the name of the HTML template for availability.

    • saveAvailability

      @PostMapping("/availability") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> saveAvailability(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> availabilityData, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Saves a therapist's availability schedule.
      Parameters:
      availabilityData - the schedule data, including dates, start time, and end time.
      session - the current user's session to identify the therapist.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a success or error message.

    • getTherapistSchedule

      @GetMapping("/schedule-dates") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Map<String,Object>>> getTherapistSchedule(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Retrieves the therapist's existing schedule.
      Parameters:
      session - the current user's session to identify the therapist.
      Returns:
      a list of schedule entries for the therapist.

    • getTherapistScheduleIds

      @GetMapping("/schedule-ids") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Integer>> getTherapistScheduleIds(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Retrieves the IDs of the therapist's schedule entries within the next 30 days.
      Parameters:
      session - the current user's session to identify the therapist.
      Returns:
      a list of schedule IDs.

    • getTherapistScheduleInfo

      @GetMapping("/schedule-info") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> getTherapistScheduleInfo(@RequestParam int scheduleId)
      Retrieves schedule information for a specific schedule ID.
      Parameters:
      scheduleId - the ID of the schedule entry.
      Returns:
      a map containing schedule details.

    • setDefaultSchedule

      @PostMapping("/default-schedule") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> setDefaultSchedule(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> scheduleData, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Sets the therapist's default schedule.
      Parameters:
      scheduleData - the default schedule data, including days of the week, start time, and end time.
      session - the current user's session to identify the therapist.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a success or error message.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • modifyAvailability

      Modifies the therapist's availability.
      Parameters:
      availabilityData - the new availability data.
      session - the current user's session to identify the therapist.

      a ResponseEntity with a success or error message.

    • getModifiedAvailability

      @GetMapping("/modified-availability") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Map<String,String>>> getModifiedAvailability(@RequestParam String startDate, @RequestParam String endDate, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Retrieves modified availability within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date of the range.
      endDate - the end date of the range.
      session - the current user's session to identify the therapist.
      Returns:
      a list of modified availability entries.

    • getAppointmentsForMonth

      Retrieves appointments for the specified month and year.
      Parameters:
      month - the month of the appointments.
      year - the year of the appointments.
      session - the current user's session to identify the therapist.

    • cancelAvailability

      @PostMapping("/cancel-availability") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> cancelAvailability(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> availabilityData, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Cancels a therapist's availability for a specific time slot.
      Parameters:
      availabilityData - the availability details to be canceled.
      session - the current user's session to identify the therapist.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a success or error message.

    • addTherapistReview

      @PostMapping("/{therapistId}/rate") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addTherapistReview(@PathVariable int therapistId, @RequestParam(name="rating") int rating)
      Submits a rating for a therapist.
      Parameters:
      therapistId - the ID of the therapist being rated.
      rating - the rating value.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a success or error message.

    • getTherapists

      @GetMapping("/therapists") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Therapist>> getTherapists()
